backend/main.mo: Defines actor state, types, and data structures for products, orders, wallets, points, diamonds, admin stats, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing implemented UI features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries describing purpose and styling of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme variables using OKLCH colors, setting light/dark tokens and default background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file providing the root element and loading the React app bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining all routes, authentication guards, and the root layout wrapped in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI card shown when a user lacks permission, with a button linking back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Component that checks user role and shows admin content, claim-access UI, or access denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard redirecting unauthenticated users to login and showing loader during initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/ClaimAdminA: Admin login form allowing users to submit credentials and trigger the claim admin mutation.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Displays a product card with icon, name, price, and optional auto-delivery badge.
Layout wrapper providing header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with contact info, social links, and legal navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Main navigation bar handling auth state, links, user menu, and wallet balance display.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Modal for submitting mobile payment details including amount and transaction ID.
frontend/src/components/promo/InstallApp: Dismissible bottom bar prompting users to install the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin hooks for fetching and approving or rejecting wallet top‑up transactions with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPoints.ts: Provides admin React Query hooks for managing points transactions, purchase requests, diamond purchases, ad rewards analytics, dashboard stats, and conversion settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading with Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines placeholder order-related hooks that return empty data or errors because backend order methods are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/usePoints.ts: Contains hooks for fetching and mutating caller points, transactions, purchase requests, diamond purchases, conversion settings, and ad reward actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching products, user profiles, roles, users, and claiming admin access with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Adds a mutation hook for submitting wallet top-up transactions and refreshing related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Offers hooks to fetch caller wallet balance and wallet transaction history.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, light/dark modes, and custom card-lift component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by mounting React, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddMoneyPage.tsx: Page for adding wallet money via mobile payment methods and viewing transaction history.
Admin dashboard showing transactions, orders, users, points data, and tools to approve or reject actions and update settings.
frontend/src/pages/AdRewardsPage.tsx: Page to watch ads, track daily ad progress, and claim point rewards with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BuyDiamondsWithPoints: Page to convert points into diamonds, validate balance, and submit diamond purchase requests.
frontend/src/pages/BuyPointsPage.tsx: Page to buy points using wallet balance, calculate conversion, and track purchase requests.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUsPage.tsx: Static contact page providing Telegram and email support information.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing balances, transactions, orders, and a profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero promo content, feature badges, and a New Offer section with navigation to add money.
frontend/src/pages/IdCodeTopUpPage.tsx: UI for selecting diamond packages and entering a Free Fire UID, with conditional payment instructions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration screen with disabled form fields that triggers Internet Identity login for account creation.
frontend/src/pages/TopupPage.tsx: Product selection page that handles top‑up ordering, authentication checks, and special routing for ID Code TopUp.
frontend/src/utils/transactionId.ts: Generates a unique transaction ID using a timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params (including hash-based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining content paths, theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing system features, architecture notes, known issues, and pending feature requests.
